page.syntax: C Result = a5_merge_JSON_into_template(jsonData as C, template as C [, javascriptFunctions as C [, partialTemplatesJSON as C [, localCSS as C ]]])

argument.name: jsonData
argument.description: The JSON data to merge into a template.

argument.name: template
argument.description: The template, defined using [Client-side Template syntax].

argument.name: javascriptFunctions
argument.description: Javascript functions referenced by the template.

argument.name: partialTemplatesJSON
argument.description: Defines partial templates that are referenced in the template.

argument.name: localCSS
argument.description: Local CSS definitions used in the template.

page.description: The a5_merge_JSON_into_template function merges JSON data into a client-side template.

discussion.p: The a5_merge_JSON_into_template function can be used to merge JSON data in to a template. The template is defined using [Client-side Templates]. The optional parameters allow you to define any Javascript functions, partial templates, or CSS styles that are referenced or used by the template. The function returns the generated HTML to be returned to the client web browser.

page.example:
dim data as c data = <<%txt% {firstname: 'Fred', lastname: 'Jones'} %txt%
template = <<%html% Name: {firstname} {lastname} %html%
htmlOut = a5_merge_JSON_into_template(data,template)
showvar(htmlOut)
